benchmark_details.name: CHARACTER BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: C HARACTER BENCH is the largest bilingual generative benchmark, with 22,859 human-annotated samples covering 3,956 characters from 25 detailed character categories, designed to evaluate LLMsâ€™ character customization capabilities across multiple dimensions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs' capability in character customization and optimize their performance.

data.source: Human-analyzed dialogue data from various character categories and domains.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by experts and researchers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human annotations and responses from LLMs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with expected character traits and improvements in customization capability.
methodology.validation: Thorough checks on inter-rater agreement for evaluations.

targeted_risks.harm: Ensure that all responses adhere to safety and ethical guidelines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The data is available under a research license, ensuring compliance guidelines are followed.
